title: A replie against an ansvver (falslie intitled) in defence of the truth, made by Iohn Rastell: M. of Art, and studient in diuinitie
author: Rastell, John, 1532-1577.
notes: An attack on John Jewel, in reply to "An answere in defence of the truth. Againste the Apologie of private masse" by Thomas Cooper, which had been printed with and in reply to "An apologie of private masse" (STC 14615).
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio.
Running title reads: A replie against the false-named defence of the truthe.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
